solution_line_template: She is making {total_water_ounces} ounces of water because {num_people} x {cup_size_per_person} = <<{num_people}*{cup_size_per_person}={total_water_ounces}>>{total_water_ounces}
She needs {tea_needed_ounces} ounces of tea because {total_water_ounces} / {mom_cup_size} = <<{total_water_ounces}/{mom_cup_size}={tea_needed_ounces}>>{tea_needed_ounces}
